content.raw:
Thanks for the tip. I did a quick search and found a couple of functions which output textual time, but neither seems to support `ms` out of the box (maybe they can display seconds with decimals though). I feel like it would take me some time to adapt the current implementation, and this is holding other pull requests related to logging.

Nevertheless, this seems to be very helpful, I should have looked into it before implementing this whole thing. If you don't mind, I'll keep it the way it is and maybe revisit this later.

* [ctime](http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/chrono/c/ctime)

* [strftime](http://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/chrono/c/strftime)
